outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 217/2016 of J.M.F.C.-I MUVATUPUZHA PETITIONER/S/ACCUSED: VIJO P JOHNSON AGED 36 YEARS S/O. JOHNSON, PALAYOOR HOUSE, NEW DOOR NO. 5/71, KAIPPARAMBU GRAMA PANCHAYATH, MUNDOOR POST, THRIS
full_text: Bee hl nie nav Beat: IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2019/KERI770 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR TUESDAY ,THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 18TH POUSHA, 1940 Crl.MC.No. 142 of 2019 AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 217/2016 of J.M.F.C.-I MUVATUPUZHA PETITIONER/S/ACCUSED: VIJO P JOHNSON AGED 36 YEARS S/O. JOHNSON, PALAYOOR HOUSE, NEW DOOR NO. 5/71, KAIPPARAMBU GRAMA PANCHAYATH, MUNDOOR POST, THRISSUR 680 541, THRISSUR DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRI.E.A.BIJUMON RESPONDENT/S/STATE: STATE OF KERALA REP. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNARKULAM. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, SRI E C BINEESH THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Pe see 2019/KER/770 Cr1.MC.No. 142 of 2019 2 ORDER Heard. In view of the limited nature of the prayer, it is directed that if the petitioner surrenders before the court below within twenty days in C.C. No.217 of 2016 and applies for regular bail, the court below shall consider and dispose of the application for bail, in accordance with law, on the date of surrender itself. The warrant, if any, shall be kept in abeyance for twenty days. This Crl.M.C. stands disposed of as above. sd/- B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR JUDGE RK/08.01.2019 HTRUE COPY/! PA TO JUDGE
